# locale(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the format style to use the specified locale.

## Declaration

```swift
func locale(_ locale: Locale) -> Duration.TimeFormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting a duration.

## Return Value

A format style with the provided locale.

## Working with locales

- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the duration.
